name: Tempeh Bacon
recipeIngredient: 2 tbsp olive oil, avocado oil, or grapeseed oil
1/4-1/2 tsp salt ( use smoked salt, if you have it)

recipeInstructions.text: Starting from the shorter side of the tempeh block, slice the tempeh into 1/4" slices
To prepare the "bacon", combine salt and spices in a small bowl. Sprinkle one side of the tempeh slices with half of the spice mixture.

Heat 1 tbsp of the olive oil in a large 12" nonstick skillet. Arrange tempeh slices in one single layer, spice side down. Sprinkle the remaining spice mixture on the tempeh. Cook over medium-low heat for about 4 minutes, until golden brown.
Drizzle the remaining tablespoon of olive oil on the tempeh, turn the slices over and continue cooking for 2-3 minutes or until the tempeh starts to turn golden (keep an eye so they don't burn).
Remove from heat and transfer the tempeh slices to a plate lined with a paper towel, to absorb any excess oil. Set aside to cool slightly
